label: 管領
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: in the Muromachi shogunate, the shogunal prime minister or deputy shogun, and often the most powerful figure in the Muromachi government.
